snippet: The lawsuit claims the supermarket promoted a store brand as products from humanely raised chickens when the animals were raised under standard commercial farming practices.
abstract: Kroger supermarket operator faces lawsuit claiming it deceived consumers by marketing store brand as products from humanely raised chickens when animals were raised under standard commercial farming.
lead_paragraph: The lawsuit claims the supermarket promoted a store brand as products from humanely raised chickens when the animals were raised under standard commercial farming practices.

headline.main: Suit Accuses Kroger of Deceit on How Poultry Was Raised
headline.print_headline: Suit Accuses Kroger of Deceit on Poultry
